title: Tomb Raider
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, Dutch, Portuguese and Spanish  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  Armed with only the raw instincts and physical ability to push beyond the limits of human endurance, Tomb Raider delivers an intense and gritty story into the origins of Lara Croft and her ascent from a frightened young woman to a hardened survivor.

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: 1939 Multiplayer Map Pack
childDownloads.description: Hangar Multiplayer Map: A former military planning, maintenance, and aircraft storage facility. The winding hallways are bathed in an eerie yellow light and are some old turrets that are still functional. Forest Meadow: This forest meadow is a hunting ground, filled with open spaces that can be advantageous and dangerous at the same time. (multiplayer map) (These maps are only accessible in "Free For All" game types)

childDownloads.title: Agency SPS 12
childDownloads.description: The shotgun that Agent 47 uses in Hitman: Absolution™ (multiplayer weapon).

childDownloads.title: Agility
childDownloads.description: The Agility skill lets Lara ascend mountain faces more quickly and ensures she lands safely from higher falls (single player upgrade).

childDownloads.title: Animal Instinct
childDownloads.description: The Animal instinct skill lights up XP-laden animals in Survival Instinct mode, to help Lara upgrade more quickly (single player upgrade).

childDownloads.title: Aviatrix Skin
childDownloads.description: This outfit dresses Lara up as a classic 1930s adventurer, bomber jacket and all (single player outfit).

childDownloads.title: Caves and Cliffs Multiplayer Map Pack
childDownloads.description: Scavenger Caverns: A massive network of caves used by the scavengers as both a prison and a torture area. Cliff Shantytown: This settlement was built high in the island cliffs.  Its many layers hide some of the deadliest traps on the island. The Burning Village: A fire has erupted in an abandoned Japanese village. The burning buildings offer multiple ways to escape your enemies, but enter them at your own peril.

childDownloads.title: Demolition Skin
childDownloads.description: Outfit Lara with the Demolition Gear, featuring an engineering jumpsuit and belt pack (single player outfit).

childDownloads.title: Fisherman
childDownloads.description: The stalwart crew Fisherman

childDownloads.title: Guerilla Skin
childDownloads.description: This outfit makes Lara look like a jungle warfare guerilla (single player outfit).

childDownloads.title: Headshot Reticle
childDownloads.description: The headshot reticule lets Lara utilize her weapons more accurately. When used with the pistol silencer, it makes for a deadly combination (single player upgrade).

childDownloads.title: Hitman: Absolution™ Weapons Pack 1
childDownloads.description: A 3-pack bundle of the weapons Agent 47 uses in Hitman: Absolution™ (multiplayer weapon pack).

childDownloads.title: Hitman: Absolution™ Weapons Pack 2
childDownloads.description: A 3-pack bundle of the weapons Agent 47 uses in Hitman: Absolution™ (multiplayer weapon pack).

childDownloads.title: Hunter Skin
childDownloads.description: This outfit camouflages Lara in a heavy coating of mud, action movie-style (single player outfit).

childDownloads.title: HX AP-15
childDownloads.description: The SMG that Agent 47 uses in Hitman: Absolution™ (multiplayer weapon).

childDownloads.title: JAGD P22G
childDownloads.description: A second Pistol that Agent 47 uses in Hitman: Absolution™ (multiplayer weapon).

childDownloads.title: Lara Croft Avatar
childDownloads.description: Be prepared for adventure at every turn with this original Lara Croft costume for your avatar.

childDownloads.title: M590 12ga
childDownloads.description: A second shotgun that Agent 47 uses in Hitman: Absolution™ (multiplayer weapon).

childDownloads.title: Tomb Raider: Monastery Escape Gameplay Walkthrough
childDownloads.description: Lara makes her way from a Monastery to the edge of a Scavenger shanty town, using the environment to succeed in brutal combat.

childDownloads.title: Mountaineer Skin
childDownloads.description: The Mountaineer outfit features the padded vest, grapples, and harness of an expert climber (single player outfit).

childDownloads.title: Pistol Burst
childDownloads.description: The three-shot burst pistol upgrade lets Lara unleash a hail of firepower on her foes (single player upgrade).

childDownloads.title: Pistol Silencer
childDownloads.description: The pistol silencer lets Lara use stealthy tactics to overcome even the trickiest of situations (single player upgrade).

childDownloads.title: Scavenger Bandit
childDownloads.description: The crafty Scavenger Bandit (multiplayer playable character).

childDownloads.title: Scavenger Executioner
childDownloads.description: The deadly Scavenger Executioner (multiplayer playable character).

childDownloads.title: Scavenger Scout
childDownloads.description: The wily Scavenger Scout (multiplayer playable character).

childDownloads.title: Shanty Town
childDownloads.description: Shanty Town Multiplayer Map: This ramshackle area features steep climbs, multiple ziplines for quick escapes, and deadly traps to set for your enemies (multiplayer map).

childDownloads.title: Shipwrecked Multiplayer Map Pack
childDownloads.description: Lost Fleet: A massive beached ship serves as a dangerous battleground filled with twists, turns, and traps.   Himiko's Cradle: This temple is carved out of the solid rock of a mountain. Full of twists and turns, the scavengers have overrun this place, corrupting its once stunning beauty, and have placed deadly traps and zip lines. Stay sharp, the threats are everywhere.  These maps are only accessible in "Free For All" game types

childDownloads.title: Silverballer
childDownloads.description: The signature Pistol that Agent 47 uses in Hitman: Absolution™ (multiplayer weapon).

childDownloads.title: STG 58 Elite
childDownloads.description: A second SMG that Agent 47 uses in Hitman: Absolution™ (multiplayer weapon).

childDownloads.title: Sure-Shot Skin
childDownloads.description: With the Sure-Shot outfit, Lara wears a competition style archery suit with high boots and forearm guards (single player outfit).

childDownloads.title: The Final Hours of Tomb Raider - Episode 1
childDownloads.description: Crystal Dynamics has partnered with video game journalist Geoff Keighley to produce an innovative new installment in his well-regarded Final Hours documented series, to be hosted by actor and gamer Zachary Levi. The Final Hours of Tomb Raider will give fans an unprecedented, fly-on-the-wall perspective of the twists and turns of game development and highlight the key creative forces responsible for reimagining the iconic video game franchise Tomb Raider.
